info.description: This is a REST API that consumes the Yelp and Google Map APIs. A restaurant recommendation with details is returned.
info.title: Hangry Ateball

get.description: By providing the required options, this will send an SMS invitation to join a friend at a specified location.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Provide an SMS-enabled phone number to receive a notification.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Provide a Twilio SMS-enabled phone number from which to send a notification.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Provide an establishment name and address to be appended to the SMS notifcation: 'Hangry Ateball invites you to join your friend at...'

200.description: status of the API request to send a message

get.summary: search for a random restaurant recommendation
get.description: This will return a random restaurant recommendation.

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: If an address is not provided, latitude and longitude are required. Pass an integer representing the latitude of the location you would like to search from.

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: If an address is not provided, latitude and longitude are required. Pass an integer representing the longitude of the location you would like to search from.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: If latitude and longitude are not provided, an address is required. A full address would include a street, city, state, and zip code (12345 Rodeo Dr, Los Angeles, CA 90210). Zip code is not required. An address can also include only a city and state (Los Angeles, CA) or state (CA).

get.summary: search for a restaurant recommendation based on preferences
get.description:
By passing in the appropriate options, you can search for
a restaurant recommendation.

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: If an address is not provided, latitude and longitude are required. Pass an integer representing the latitude of the location you would like to search from.

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: If an address is not provided, latitude and longitude are required. Pass an integer representing the longitude of the location you would like to search from.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: If latitude and longitude are not provided, an address is required. A full address would include a street, city, state, and zip code (12345 Rodeo Dr, Los Angeles, CA 90210). Zip code is not required. An address can also include only a city and state (Los Angeles, CA) or state (CA).

parameters.name: price
parameters.description: Pass an integer (1 - 4) to select a maximum price point ($ - $$$$). For example, when 3 is entered, the search will also include restaurants with a price point of 2 and 1.

parameters.name: travel
parameters.description: Enter either 'walk' or 'drive'. If walk is entered, a radius of 1600 meters will be searched. If drive is entered, a radius of 16,000 meters will be searched.

parameters.name: categories
parameters.description: Pass a selection of cuisine types to filter restaurants with. The category filter can be a list of comma-delimited categories.
